title: Time Killers
description:
A collection of one shots by Kato Kazue, including the original pilot for Ao no Exorcist.

1. Boku to Usagi
2. Akanasu
3. Akai Daichi ni Umareta Senshi no Hanashi
4. USA Boy!!!
5. Hime Goro mo Torisetsu Manga
6. Jinsei Kaidou Hagure Hoshi
7. Nirai
8. Nushi to Bou
9. Otome no Inori
10. HoshiOta (Astronerd)
11. [u]Miyama Uguisutei Jiken[/u] (Ao no Exorcist pilot)
Monaka, the heiress to a prestigious family, is staying with her sadistic and controlling uncle after the death of her parents. Her life is given a twist upon the arrival of an unsual exorcist claiming the mansion is being haunted by a demon.
